price: 141. Marka wuu la qori tuurtay15, wuxuuse noqday mid laga raayey (baddana lagu tuuray).
footnotes: 15. Si loo cayimo qofka laga tuurayo doonnida si loo badbaadiyo rikaabka kale. Waxaa ku soo baxay qori tuurkii Yuunus c.s., markaasay ku tuureen badda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
